#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main(){
	long long int t;
	scanf("%lld",&t);
	while(t--){
	string s,ans="";
	cin>>s;
	long long int i,flag=0;
	for(i=0;i<s.length();i++){
	   if(s[i]=='0' || s[i]=='8' || s[i]=='6' || s[i]=='9' || s[i]=='1'){
	   	if(s[i]=='6')
	   	   ans='9'+ans;
	   	else if(s[i]=='9')
	   	   ans='6'+ans;
	    else
	       ans=s[i]+ans;
	    continue;
	   }
	   flag=1;
	   break;
	}
	if(flag==0){
	   printf("YES\n");
	   cout<<ans<<endl;
    }
    else printf("NO\n");
    }
	return 0;
}
